title: *******9/1 OAK SQ-BRIGHTON LARGE PET-FRIENDLY 4BED/2BA PLUS OFFICE!
posting_body: AVAILABLE:
PET-FRIENDLY UNIT
Recently renovated 4BR 2Bath condo on the second and third floors of two family house in desirable Oak Sq. neighborhood of Brighton.
Unit features include a full dining room, extra office space, new baths and updated kitchen with stainless appliances and granite c/tops.
Newer plumbing and 100amp electric service.
Central heat & a/c, vinyl windows,and hardwood floors thru-out.
Front and back enclosed 3-season porches.
Ample storage and private laundry in basement.
One car garage parking and 1 outdoor spaces.
Pets allowed.
Common yard area.
Walk to Hobart Park, Charles River, Boston Express bus and easy access to Mass Pike.
Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!
BenC @
Benjaminapartments .
com
